Trade/Device Name(s): MEG-2B Pro Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MEG-2B and MEG-2B Pro Blood Glucose Monitoring Systems for quantitative glucose measurement in capillary whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, forearm, or palm; MEG-2B is for self-testing by lay people at home, MEG-2B Pro is for professional use in healthcare settings; not for diagnosis or neonatal use.
